member.name: T:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.GroundStation
member.summary: Implements an example SCOE Service, echoes incoming SCOE Command's data into a SCOE Observation report.

member.name: P:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.GroundStation.ServiceType
member.summary: The Service Type of this service.

member.name: F:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.GroundStation._egseClient
member.summary: The EGSE Router Client instance to use to send messages.

member.name: M:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.GroundStation.#ctor(System.Byte,Epfl.SwissCube.GroundSegment.Egse.RouterClient.RouterClient)
member.summary: Creates an instance of this SCOE Service.
member.param: The SCOE Service Type to use.
The EGSE Router Client instance to use to send messages.

member.name: M:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.GroundStation.ProcessScoeCommand(Epfl.SwissCube.GroundSegment.Data.Egse.ReceiveDataMessage,Epfl.SwissCube.GroundSegment.Data.Egse.ScoeCommand)
member.summary: Processes a SCOE Command Request for this service.
member.param: The ReceiveData message that contains the SCOE Command Request.

member.name: M:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.GroundStation.processEchoCommand(Epfl.SwissCube.GroundSegment.Data.Egse.ReceiveDataMessage,Epfl.SwissCube.GroundSegment.Data.Egse.ScoeCommand)
member.summary: Echoes the data received in a SCOE Command Request (Type,1) into a report of type (Type,2).
member.param: The ReceiveData message that contains the SCOE Command Request.

member.name: T:Astrocast.GroundSegment.GroundStation.Program
member.summary: EGSE program that connects to the EGSE Router and dispatches SCOE Groundstation Commands to a radio and rotator.

member.summary: Contains whether the program is being closed.

member.summary: Entry point method of the program.

member.summary: Waits for user to press enter or Ctrl+C to quit.
